import React from 'react'; import { Plus, Minus, Package, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const StockManagement = () => { const stockItems = [ { id: 1, name: 'Whiteboard Markers', category: 'Stationery', current: 45, minimum: 50, unit: 'pcs', status: 'low' }, { id: 2, name: 'A4 Paper Reams', category: 'Stationery', current: 120, minimum: 50, unit: 'reams', status: 'good' }, { id: 3, name: 'Chemistry Beakers', category: 'Lab', current: 30, minimum: 25, unit: 'pcs', status: 'good' }, { id: 4, name: 'Printer Ink Cartridges', category: 'Electronics', current: 8, minimum: 15, unit: 'pcs', status: 'critical' }, { id: 5, name: 'Cleaning Supplies', category: 'Maintenance', current: 25, minimum: 20, unit: 'units', status: 'good' } ]; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const badges = { good: 'badge-success', low: 'badge-warning', critical: 'badge-danger' }; return badges[status]; }; const getStatusText = (status) => { return status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + status.slice(1); }; return (

Stock Management

Monitor and update inventory levels

Total Items

228

Low Stock

1

Critical Stock

1

{stockItems.map((item) => ( ))}
Item Name Category Current Stock Minimum Level Status Actions
{item.name} {item.category} {item.current} {item.unit} {item.minimum} {item.unit} {getStatusText(item.status)}
); }; export default StockManagement;
